1.name: Sarah M.
1.text: Liberty Paws made the ESA letter process so simple. My landlord accepted it immediately, and now Max can stay with me!

3.text: Fast, professional, and legitimate. Got my ESA letter in less than 24 hours. The support team was incredibly helpful.

q1.question: How long does it take to get my ESA letter?
q1.answer: Most ESA letters are delivered within 24-48 hours after your evaluation is completed.

q2.question: Are your ESA letters legitimate?
q2.answer: Yes! All our ESA letters are written by licensed mental health professionals and comply with federal law.

q3.question: What if my landlord doesn't accept the letter?
q3.answer: We provide support and guidance. Landlords are legally required to accept valid ESA letters under the Fair Housing Act.

esa-letter-housing.name: ESA Letter for Housing
esa-letter-housing.description: Official Emotional Support Animal letter for housing accommodations under the Fair Housing Act. Written by a licensed mental health professional, this letter ensures your landlord recognizes your legal right to live with your ESA.

esa-letter-travel.name: ESA Letter for Travel
esa-letter-travel.description: Documentation for traveling with your Emotional Support Animal on airlines. Our licensed professionals provide proper documentation to ensure smooth travel experiences with your companion.

esa-combo-package.name: ESA Complete Package
esa-combo-package.description: Comprehensive ESA package including both housing and travel letters, plus an official ESA ID card. The best value for complete coverage and peace of mind.

psd-registration.name: Psychiatric Service Dog Registration
psd-registration.description: Official registration for your Psychiatric Service Dog with comprehensive documentation and ID card. ADA compliant documentation to protect your rights in public spaces.

psd-training-guide.name: PSD Training & Documentation
psd-training-guide.description: Complete training guide and documentation package for Psychiatric Service Dogs. Includes training curriculum, public access guide, and legal rights handbook.

psd-complete-kit.name: PSD Complete Kit
psd-complete-kit.description: Everything you need for your Psychiatric Service Dog: full registration, official ID card, service dog vest, and comprehensive documentation. The ultimate package for complete service dog support.
